ARABIC: فَلَمَّآ أَحَسُّوا۟ بَأْسَنَآ إِذَا هُم مِّنْهَا يَرْكُضُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: When they perceived Our violent force they ran away from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Whensoever they sensed Our punishment they fled from them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then, when they perceived Our chastisement they took to their heels and fled.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When they found Our torment approaching them they started to run away from the town.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And when they tasted Our punishment, they immediately started fleeing from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then, when they sensed Our torment, behold, they (tried to) flee from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So when they felt Our punishment, lo! they began to fly
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then, when they perceived Our might, behold, they ran headlong out of it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And, when they felt Our might, behold them fleeing from it!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: When they felt Our punishment coming upon them, they began to flee from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then when they perceived Our violence, lo! they were from it fleeing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So when they sighted Our punishment, behold, they ran away from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Yet, when they felt Our Punishment (coming), behold, they (tried to) flee from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then, when they perceived (saw) Our Torment (coming), behold, they (tried to) flee from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And when they felt Our Might they fled from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then, when they sensed Our might, they started running away from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And when its inhabitants perceived Our punishment, at once they fled from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [21:12] And when they felt Our might, [when] the inhabitants of the town sensed destruction [to be near], behold, they ran away from it, they flee hastily [therefrom].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And, when they felt Our might) when they saw Our chastisement which was to destroy them, (behold them fleeing from it) they run away from Our might!
